name: eHomeLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on my bedroom”
”Alexa, turn off my bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thank you for choosing eHomeLife product.

Now you can voice control your eHomeLife smart plug mini with Amazon Alexa.
Once your eHomeLife account is verified and linked to Amazon Alexa account, you can discover all your devices by saying “Alexa, discover my deivces” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app. 

After that, to voice control your devices, simply use below command:
“Alexa, turn on my bedroom”
“Alexa, turn off my bedroom”

eHomeLife is a startup company which focus on smart home gadgets. More eHomeLife products are coming on the way to your life. :- )
